ModMetaData.name: Clockwork And Steam
ModMetaData.author: Chance2000w
ModMetaData.description:
V0.6 This mod adds various bits and baubles relating to clockwork (and eventually steam power).
WARNING: THIS MOD IS IN DEVELOPMENT. MOD CONFLICTS ARE POSSIBLE. BE SURE TO HAVE BACKUPS OF ANY SAVES BEFORE ENABLING THIS MOD. I've tested it with my own personal modpack and it has no errors. However, if you encounter any issues, feel free to report them to me.
